content: I think it would be helpful for /etc/zulip/settings.py to include instructions for how to restart the server after changing settings (sudo zulip -c .../restart-server), or possibly a link to http://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/latest/production/customize.html. Thoughts?
AFAIUI, restart-server is necessary and sufficient after changing any setting in that file.
yeah, totally reasonable. I'll open an issue, since I'm also not totally confident what the instructions should be
(as root or via sudo) supervisorctl restart all? Or is this not sufficient that rabbitmq needs to be restarted?
